description: GitHub repository and version control management
explanation: Integration with GitHub for repository management, issue tracking, pull requests, build status, and code quality analysis

inputDefinitions.name: action
inputDefinitions.description: The action to perform (get_repos, create_issue, list_prs, check_build_status, get_commits, analyze_code_quality)

outputDefinitions.name: result
outputDefinitions.description: Operation result with repository, issue, PR, or commit data
